title: (BUG REPORT) Gangplank ult upgrade not working.
body: Sometimes it wont let you upgrade your ultimate, even if you have enough silver serpents, in the images included, i have 500 and anther time with 1000 and i couldn't upgrade it either time, it just acted as if i didnt have enough money.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Thanks for the report - we know about this bug and are working on a fix. A quick work around is to buy the ult upgrade from the "All Items" tab.

-Terra

Yea I've had this, people have mentioned it before dw, its not just you. I wouldn't bother playing GP till its fixed, its awfully annoying if your twice ahead of the enemy GP but he can upgrade his ult and you cant.
